About the Company: Lakshmi Precision Screws Ltd. was established in 1968. Company is in the business of manufacture of high tensile fasteners. The Company is a manufacturer of automotive and engineering components. Its main products are Machine screws, bolts, nuts etc. The Company provides fastening technology globally having joint ventures, license agreements, and alliances with different fastening companies globally. It caters to various sectors, such as wind energy, oil and gas, locomotives, automobiles, agriculture equipments (tractors), machine building and different industrial and its sub-con items. . Its manufacturing unit is located at Hissar Road, Rohtak, Haryana.
